task.title: Displaying information about objects
task.shortdesc: You can display information about the selected objects. The information varies, depending on the type of objects you select. All of the listings display the following information:

ul.li: The location of the object (its XYZ coordinates relative to the current user coordinate system [UCS]).
The current space (model space on the Model tab or paper space on a Layout tab).

The size of the object (the information varies, depending on the object type).
To display information about an object
Choose Tools > Inquiry > List from the mainmenu.
Select one or more objects.
Press Enter.

context.p: TIP To return to the drawing window, press F2.
